thread.title: Oregon Sues Monsanto, Says Company Responsible for PCB Pollution

author: wsjcom
title: Oregon Sues Monsanto, Says Company Responsible for PCB Pollution
text:
PORTLAND, Ore.â€”Oregon is suing the agrochemical giant Monsanto over PCB pollution the state says has contaminated its waterways and wildlife.
The lawsuit filed Thursday by Oregon Attorney General Ellen Rosenblum seeks $100 million to mitigate pollution that state officials say has accumulated over decades.
Monsanto said in an emailed statement... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
